field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Title (required)
field.hint: Enter the full official title of the item (including any subtitles, etc).
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: Enter any alternative titles for the item (other languages, etc).

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.

field.label: Authors (required)
field.hint: Enter the names of individual or corporate authors of this item (enter each individually).

field.label: CGIAR author ORCID identifiers
field.hint: Enter ORCID identifiers for CGIAR authors, one per author. If an identifier is missing from the list, enter a new one in the exact same format (Name: 0000-0002-1735-7458). Use the exact name style the author uses at https://orcid.org

field.label: Author affiliations
field.hint: Enter the full name of the institutions that the author(s) work for (enter each individually).

field.label: Sponsor
field.hint: Enter full institution name(s) who sponsored the item. Click below to see a pre-populated list, or add one manually. CGIAR Research Program funding is identified in the field above.

field.label: Authorship types
field.hint: Characterize the entire authorship based on author affiliations.

field.label: Journal Title
field.hint: Enter the full journal title.

field.label: Journal Volume
field.hint: Enter the journal volume. For example, if published in PLoS ONE 16(1), the volume is: 16

field.label: Journal Issue
field.hint: Enter the journal issue. For example, if published in PLoS ONE 16(1), the issue number is: 1

field.label: Edition
field.hint: Enter the edition of the item (3rd, 17th, Revised).

field.label: Pagination
field.hint: Enter the page range for an article or chapter (p. 10-17); or the total pages for a report (120 p.).

field.label: Date of publication (required)
field.hint: Enter the date when the item was officially published or made public. For journal articles, this is the date the article was included in a volume/issue, if known. If the issue date is not known, please use the online first date here.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Date of online publication
field.hint: Enter the date when the item was available online. Use this to indicate a journal article was online first, and use the publication date for the issue date.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the full name of the publisher.

field.label: Citation (required)
field.hint: Enter the standard citation.

field.label: Series/Report Name
field.hint: Enter the full official series/report name, for example CCAFS Info Note or ILRI Research Report.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series/report number.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Access rights (required)
field.hint: Indicate the accessibility of the item. If the item is free to read this should be "Open Access", even if it is copyrighted.

field.label: Usage rights (required)
field.hint: Indicate the usage rights of the item. For most items this will be a Creative Commons license. Look on the publisher's page or in the PDF itself if available. Choose "Other" if the item does not have a license or none is specified.

field.label: Journal Status
field.hint: Indicate if the item was published in an ISI journal.

field.label: Grey Literature
field.hint: Indicate whether the item was formally published or not. In general, any output other than journal articles and books are grey literature.

field.label: Review Status
field.hint: Indicate whether the item has undergone internal or peer review.

field.label: Target audience
field.hint: Indicate the main audience for whom the item is produced.

field.label: ISBN
field.hint: Enter the ISBN for the item, for example: 978-3-16-148410-0

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: Enter the ISSN for the serial publication where this item appears, for example: 2049-3630

field.label: External URL
field.hint: Enter a full URL for the item, for example a website, blog post, Google Books URL, etc (do not use this for links to datasets, use data URL instead).

field.label: Document Object Identifier (DOI)
field.hint: Enter the full address in format: https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-019-43406-0

field.label: URL for data file
field.hint: A URL for any associated data file(s), in a repository for example.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please leave this blank.

field.label: CGIAR Initiatives
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Initiatives(s) associated with this item. Use this to show that an Initiative funded this item.

field.label: CGIAR Impact Platforms
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Impact Platforms associated with this item.

field.label: CGIAR Impact Areas
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Impact Areas associated with this item.

field.label: CGIAR Action Areas
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Action Areas associated with this item.

field.label: UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
field.hint: Select any UN Sustainable Development Goals associated with this item.

field.label: CGIAR Research Programs and Platforms (2012–2021)
field.hint: Select any CGIAR Research Program(s) and Platform(s) associated with this item. Use this to show that a CRP funded this item.

field.label: Country
field.hint: Select a country or countries within the scope of the item.

field.label: Region
field.hint: Select a region or regions within the scope of the item.

field.label: Subregion
field.hint: Enter the subregion. Normally provinces, states, regions, etc WITHIN a country according to ISO 3166-2 subdivisions.

field.label: River basin
field.hint: Select the focus basin(s).

field.label: AGROVOC Keywords
field.hint: Enter AGROVOC subjects in lower case.

field.label: IWMI Library ID
field.hint: IWMI Library internal reference (eg H049940)

field.label: Alliance of Bioversity and CIAT subject
Notes
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Related video
field.hint: Enter related video link (eg a video about this item).

field.label: Related audio
field.hint: Enter related audio link (eg an audio about this item).

field.label: Related photo
field.hint: Enter related photo link (eg a photo or image associated with this item).

field.label: Related reference
field.hint: Enter related reference link (normally a URL to another item).

field.label: Related citation
field.hint: Enter related reference citation (normally a full citation, not a URL).

field.label: Species
field.hint: Enter scientific name of organism, plant, animal, etc if it is a main focus of the item, for example: Lablab purpureus, Bos Taurus, Oryza sativa, Theileria parva

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Last name
field.hint: Enter the last name of the person

field.label: First name
field.hint: Enter the first name of the person

field.label: Email
field.hint: Enter the email of the person

field.label: Birth date
field.hint: Enter the birth date of the person

field.label: Job title
field.hint: Enter the job title of the person

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the project

field.label: ID
field.hint: Enter the id of the project

relation-field.label: Investigator
relation-field.hint: Enter the investigator's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter the keywords of the project

field.label: Start date
field.hint: Enter the start date of the project

field.label: End date
field.hint: Enter the end date of the project

field.label: Amount
field.hint: Enter the amount of the project

field.label: Amount currency
field.hint: Enter the amount currency of the project

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the project

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the orgunit

field.label: ID
field.hint: Enter the id of the orgunit

field.label: Date established
field.hint: Enter the established date of the orgunit

field.label: City
field.hint: Enter the city of the orgunit

field.label: Country
field.hint: Enter the country of the orgunit

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the orgunit

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal

field.label: Editor
field.hint: Enter the editor of the journal

field.label: ISSN
field.hint: Enter the issn of the journal

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the publisher of the journal

relation-field.label: Journal
relation-field.hint: Select the journal related to this volume.

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal volume

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume of the journal volume

field.label: Issue date
field.hint: Enter the issue date of the journal volume

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal volume

relation-field.label: Journal Volume
relation-field.hint: Select the journal volume related to this issue.

field.label: Name
field.hint: Enter the name of the journal issue

field.label: Number
field.hint: Enter the number of the journal issue

field.label: Issue date
field.hint: Enter the issue date of the journal issue

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the journal issue

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter the keywords of the journal issue

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.required: At least one author (plain text or relationship) is required

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Editor Version
field.hint: Enter the URL/DOI of the editor version of this item.

field.label: Related Dataset
field.hint: Enter the URL/DOI of the related Dataset.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Title of Journal, Book or Event
field.hint: Include the name of related item like the journal name, book title or event name.

field.label: Event/Conference Place
field.hint: Enter the event location.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: Enter the date of the event.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume of the item.

field.label: Issue
field.hint: Enter the issue number of the item.

field.label: Edition
field.hint: Enter the edition of the item.

field.label: First Page
field.hint: Enter the start page number.

field.label: Last Page
field.hint: Enter the last page number.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.

field.label: Resource Version
field.hint: Select the version of the resource. If the resource does not have that information, please select "Not Applicable (or Unknown)".

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Access Type
field.hint: Select the access type of the resource.

field.label: License
field.hint: Select the license of the resource.

field.label: Coverage
field.hint: Enter the coverage of the item, like a period, jurisdiction, etc.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Last name
field.hint: Enter surname or last name of the person

field.label: First name
field.hint: Enter personal or first name of the person

field.label: Author preferred name
field.hint: Enter the preferred name of this person regarding the authorship

field.label: Affiliation Name
field.hint: Enter the organizational or institutional affiliation of this person

field.label: Email
field.hint: Enter the email of the person

field.label: Author identifier
field.hint: If the author has any identifiers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Project name
field.hint: Enter the name of the project

field.label: Project web page
field.hint: Enter the URL of the project webpage

field.label: Name of the Funding Stream
field.hint: Enter the name of the funding stream of the project

field.label: Award number
field.hint: Enter the identifier of the project

field.label: Organization name
field.hint: Enter the name of the orgunit or organization

field.label: Organization identifier
field.hint: If the organization has any identifiers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Organization type
field.hint: Choose the attributes of the Organization

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter the description of the orgunit
